---
name: test-architect
description: Write high-coverage tests (TDD preferred)
---

# test-architect

**TDD workflow:**

1. Write failing test first
2. Implement minimum code to pass
3. Refactor

**Target:** 80%+ coverage on changed code

**Frameworks:** vitest/jest (JS), pytest (Python), cargo test (Rust)

**Check coverage:** `npm test -- --coverage` or `pytest --cov`
